thread.title: 2 Chainz Turns Down Invite To Perform At Trump Inauguration
thread.title_full: 2 Chainz Turns Down Invite To Perform At Trump Inauguration

author: Danny Schwartz
title: 2 Chainz Turns Down Invite To Perform At Trump Inauguration
text:
Home > Music > 2 Chainz Declines Invite To Perform At Trump Inauguration 2 Chainz Declines Invite To Perform At Trump Inauguration 0 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Jan 14, 2017 at 08:54pm "I had to say 'nah.'" 
Donald Trump has a problem: no one wants to perform at his inauguration. Not even Tity Boi. 
2 Chainz revealed on Instagram Friday that he turned down in an invitation from Trump's team. "I know they only doing this because they can't get nobody else," he explained. "I had to say 'nah,' no matter how much money it was. I probably won't be going to the White House no time soon." 
3 Doors Down, Toby Keith, and teen opera singer Jackie Evancho are currently scheduled to perform at the sentient cheeto's inauguration this upcoming Friday. Broadway singer Jennifer Holliday was originally on the bill but withdrew today , citing a "lapse in judgement." 
Watch 2 Chainz share the news below. A video posted by 2 Chainz Aka Tity Boi (@hairweavekiller) on Jan 13, 2017 at 12:27pm PST
